durang: 1~Nedar Burujolare Siṛimi chi Siruṅ.~Ginataególaya ॥koṅ॥~Kana ṉhapui Siṛimi, kanah ṉhapui Siruṅ,~Baleć misińtańe Chana ginataególoya ॥koṅ॥²
2~Sasaṅakan Piḍingire, sunumakan Piḍingire.~Baleć mising tańe chana kitaṕ saṭao tan ॥koṅ॥~Ṉochare Dikuṉhon, Ṉhora ṉaṅkirvaićmea.~Misińere murukuṅ nelsenoḱtea ॥koṅ॥²
3~Kákasakam tinjarbonjar,~Chekan kili tana jam dinḍanhapanum ॥koṅ॥²~Kili kam jagar redo,~Nańaḱ kili ² teń kili misame ॥koṅ॥²

4~Hesaā mata matalena baḍi mata matalena(ṭik samay rege~Tuyum seṭer akana) ॥koṅ॥²~Hesaā mata ² chaba jana baḍi mata ² chaba jana~Sama gea tuyum bonḍo l akana ॥koṅ॥²~Nale noṛaāre tuyu seta menaḱć(hakaka bakaka tana~Tuyu kakiṛi mea) ॥koṅ॥²
5~Misiń racha Bakara kiṭuṕakan tiruṕ akana ॥koṅ॥²~Ṭapa ṭapa baduṛi, ṭapagasarket́ ॥koṅ॥²
6~Nimiṅ jeṭe nimiṅ lolo~Nen Ṉuli sakam don akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥~Bale kimiń seṭer lena,~Nen Ṉuli sakam don akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥
7~Latarete jugi Hon, chetanete jugi hona.~ 'koy ' koyate jugim seṭer lena ॥koṅ॥²~Negayaṅ goṛe menae recha,~Napuiṅ goṛe menae recha,~ 'koye, koyedo jugi nonah koyado noma meh ॥koṅ॥²

8~Daḱ do daḱ do tetaṅhi tan,~Lai do lai do rengehi tana.~Nokon kore dudulūm daḱ do beṭaoha ॥koṅ॥~Chimin saning chimin jiling,~Nokon reja dudulūm daḱ do beṭaoha ॥koṅ॥~Daṅh do beṭao hametam,~Diri sut́, rūgut́ sut́ dah do beṭaoha ॥koṅ॥²
9~Munḍa koh rachare, santa koh rachare,~Kuṭura chi muta riṛi hekena ॥koṅ॥²~Kana napui kuṭura, akana napui muta,~Munḍa kore talaṕ ṭaka riḍiṅ hekena ॥koṅ॥²
10~Buru bitar Mage, beḍa bitar Mage,~Chikatere daṛachu naiu mehaleleṛa ॥koṅ॥²~Rūtu riu ² teṅh nayum mele ḍah ॥koṅ॥~Banam cheo ² teṅh nayum mele ḍah॥
11~Neder piṛi ² t akan sari baṅ, kalai ba nerainelaḍah ॥koṅ॥²~Gono sati menah rechalaṅ keā ruāi॥
12~Ṉaben dona bale bareh,~Rūtu tedo, banam tedo nesum rasika ॥koṅ॥²~Rūtu te do banam te kaben nasulo ॥koṅ॥
13~Negay, napui mena redo,~Baṛi daru lidi ² sua riṅ ॥koṅ॥²~Nengay, napui bangay,~Baṛi daru lidi ², doṛa he jana ॥koṅ॥²
14~Ṉaben doja bale bareng,~Kenjar bonjar raja doben beṭa taya chi ॥koṅ॥²~Beṭa ṛoliṅ beṭa taya,~Samaṛam ganḍū rinki rakaṕ akana ॥koṅ॥²
15~Buru mage chabahana, beṛa mage chaba hana,~Chigo chekan teben tol gojena ॥koṅ॥²~Niha tinge sanaṅh,~Baṭa baṭi burūre baṭi gojen ben ॥koṅ॥²
16~Nender burū jolare,~Jiki china, sarasanḍi manḍa rakab let́a ॥koṅ॥~Kana napui jiki, akana napui sarasanḍi,~Bale Barańh cha metam manḍa rakaṕ leṛa ॥koṅ॥
17~Chia chia chepar Hon, chia chia guturahona.~Haga ko disu meh do bugi tana chia ॥koṅ॥~Sukuge bano, dukūge~Maḍako bir kore ko bakaṛa tana ॥koṅ॥²

18~Ṉabendoja Balećbareń, Burubitar Reaṛi benaniro niriya,~Nhoromataleeredo, jangimataleeredo,~Magereaḱ Dotidoben kirĩya chi ॥koṅ॥²~Kaben kirĩya redo, kaben kejanay redo,~Ṉaben geda balego barey disum tumio ॥koṅ॥
19~Chetan pukari chel chopol,~Latar pukari chel chola.~Baṅ lekan naku kiṅ rakaṕe lena ॥koṅ॥²~Jĩbiri menahḱ recha laṅ, jibiri koṭoūṅ kiṅ ॥koṅ॥²~Raba mena recha laṅ, raba koṭoūṅ kiṅ ॥koṅ॥²
20~Bareń racha kadam daru,~Kadam daru chetanete da do joro tana ॥koṅ॥²~Daḱ do telae ben bareng,~Sona rūpa tiṛite da, do telae ben ॥koṅ॥²
21~Jiṛim suku jan redo;~Boṛo reā baṛa napanum baṛa nemańe meh |k koṅ॥²~Jiṛi karem suku jan redo,~Boṛo reā baṛa napanum nalom nemaṅiaṅ ॥koṅ॥²
22~Chetano ko mag akana, lataro ko mag akana,~Nokonare juṛilang mage misana ॥koṅ॥²~Mage misana lang juṛiṅ,~Bala saka nature lang mage misana ॥koṅ॥²
23~Munḍa ko racha kadam daru,~Jeṭe tichi lolate moyalan tana ॥koṅ॥²~Kana napui jeṭe te, akana napui lolate,~Samay bapui seno tanate, moyalan tan ॥koṅ॥²
24~Disumedo gule gule, raṅnachi do mele mele,~Disum kochi Bareń ben niatintana ॥koṅ॥²
25~Naling doja bale bareng~Sirima jeṭe, note lolo riliaṅ ॥koṅ॥²~Ṉaben doja bale bareng,~Mat́ko bitar juṅbulae nubul rebena ॥koṅ॥²
26~Chetan pukari, latar pukari,~Maena moh nakukiṅ rakabelena ॥koṅ॥²~Nasulikiṅ ben go bareng,~Bugin ² jagadare nasulikiṅ ben ॥koṅ॥²~Gonoākiṅ ben go bareng,~Ikoisi baisi kore gonoākiṅ ben ॥koṅ॥²

27~Buru bitar mage do, pata bitar mage do,~Dili kulań ben go bareng, kaji kulań ben ॥koṅ॥²~Kaben dili kulań redo, kaben kaji kulań redo,~Baṭa baṭi buru reaḱ baṭi gojena ॥koṅ॥~Tole tole buru reṅa tol gojena ॥koṅ॥²
28~Niyang tikiṅ napung tikiṅ mena redo,~Chiṭi kireṅ maḍi, nūtū dul akana ॥koṅ॥²~Niyang tikiṅ napui tikiṅ bang kiṅā,~Chiṭi kire maḍi nūtū noṭang jana ॥koṅ॥²
29~Chetan kunḍi, latar kunḍi~Doneha chi masala leko chenḍo tana~Kana napui donea, akana napui masala,~Bareń here beneṭa leko chenḍo tana ॥koṅ॥²
30~Nuli chuṭūkay riya bareng~Nisir chenḍo do.~Jagada daaḱ riya bareng~Keḱ ye baṭa do.~Guli tuṭi menaḱ redo bareng,~Tuyanja lopoṅ tai mea bale Bareń ॥koṅ॥²
31~Nengaṅe napuṅe mena redo,~Nuli ḍumasū ḍumba, kuda ḍumasū ḍumba nuṅbal nerĩāḱ~Negaṅe napuṅe bangaya,~Nuli ḍumasū ḍumba, kuda ḍumasū ḍumba,~Numbul goyo natu ḍing ॥koṅ॥²
32~Nape disum do munḍa,~Dirisut́ bonj raja dado niji tan ॥koṅ॥²~Nale disum do munḍa,~Pataa gasar jan redo dado ranjeḍo ॥koṅ॥²

33~Hatu kuṭi uli daru,~Meaḍege jo len esu sibila.~Mata somay hoao redo, jome samay hoao redo,~Kagajo sakamere ole kulaeṅ bena.~Kam ole kulaeṅ redo, kam dili kulaeṅ redo,~Baṭa baṭi buru reṅ baṭṭi gojena॥~Heleke teke buru reṅ tol gojena ॥koṅ॥
34~Kam toṭ akan reó, kam sangar ken reó,~Laṛata jilūm nela rem tabu tabuya.~Nisai sarige chakat́ bano,~Laḍata jilūm nela rem tabu tabuya ॥koṅ॥
35~Neang napuṅi ṭai kenare,~Bangali doti chaeṅ tega tegaya.~Neang napui bage kiḍing,~Seer lija botoe botoy akana ॥koṅ॥
36~Mage paraṕ hoba lena,~Nen rechiń nu nuā tehareṅ nu nuā ॥koṅ॥
37~Manḍidoko manḍitana, reberebe,~Ṉilidoko chalatana choṭochoṭo,~Ṉichaḱbaha Juḍń do Met́eć jolopi ॥koṅ॥²

38~Buddi netoy-ālaṅ misiṅ,~Chiṭi miṭi bangalare buddi netoy ālaṅ.~Buddi neto kere misiṅ, diri lekan se laṭilaṅ nobor ket́a॥~Jaṭi lekan kagajolaṅ nitir ket́a॥~Buddi neto kere misiṅ,~Nende nonol punḍi kagajo disum jari ket́ ॥koṅ॥

39~Ṉamdona Barań negam menai,~Ṉamdona bare napūm menai,~Sadae jor balego Barań, chatom numbūl rem ॥koṅ॥~Nań dona Barań ṉengań bangae,~Nań dona Barań napūiṅ bagay,~Sadae jor balego Barań, jibon jeṭe loloreh ॥koṅ॥~Nańonga ṉengań menaḱć redo, ṉańoga naṅpūi menaḱć redo,~Sadae jor balego Barań jiban chatom numbūl reh ॥koṅ॥

40~Neṭeḍiṅhatanagoṅm bare, neṭeḍiṅh-tanama.~Mihaḍege misim tem neṭeḍiṅh-tana ॥koṅ॥~Chabūṛa tańabenago Barań chabūṛatań ben,~Gelebar doreare chabūṛatań ben ॥koṅ॥~Chapa natū̃i benago Barań, chapa natuiṅ ben,~Nilabaṛi kagajore chapa natūiṅ bena.~Meḍadaham joroy-hago Barań, meḍadaham joroyaha,~Chapa sakam nel kete meḍadaham joroyaha ॥koṅ॥

41~Buddim neto tan go Barań,~Binihūr nisikūlareh buddim ne to tana ॥koṅ॥~Ṭibūl bil akanago Barań,~āikorṭ bagaṅlare ṭibūl bilakana.~Ṭibūl chetan rena Barań,~Sona reha kagajo bilanakah naha ॥koṅ॥~Buddim neto lereṅ Barań,~Sonareha pĩsilate nomboratuimeha ॥koṅ॥

42~Chetan pukari latar pukari,~Napū̃i gecha roṛa let́ joṛa nūli bah ॥koṅ॥ Dhūḱ si0॥~Baṛay nasitan Barań,~Nede nende sepeṛet́ baṛay nasitan ॥koṅ॥ Siḱ dū0॥~Baṛago nemaiḱ ben Barań,~Tiṛigo chetan biṛiteh baṛagoh nemaiben ॥koṅ॥ Siḱ dū0॥
43~Surūgo sutam dogo Barań gutuihalang,~Chigo Barań galańalang ॥koṅ॥~Buddim neto tanago Barań,~Kumpani duhare buddim netotana ॥koṅ॥~Nisirakanagom Barań, surū sutam galaṅ hankan,~Nisira ka nam ॥koṅ॥
44~Jeṭe singi seṭer lena,~Koto koto baha lena jenga jūṛi bah ॥koṅ॥ Dhūḱ si0॥~Ji, ge, soṛanago metam,~Mūtūḍa mūtūḍa ji, ge, lalacho ॥koṅ॥siḱ dū0॥
45~Ṉengań napūiṅ ṭai kena,~Gete gete senehor tala riliṅ ha ॥koṅ॥~Ṉengań napūiṅ baṅ kiha,~Gete gete senehor tisaratūḍiń ॥koṅ॥

46~Gaḍako nasi ludam baṛa,~Chiminete misiṅ koben jagaray ha ॥koṅ॥~Gutūi āchim galańa,~Chiminete misiṅ koben kajiāya ha ॥koṅ॥~Jahogeh metam jahogeh,~Nijū seno ha ॥koṅ॥~Jahogeh metam jahogeh,~Jagaratū̃i ha ॥koṅ॥~Kajinatū̃i ha ॥koṅ॥²
47~Ṉengań napū̃i ṭaikena,~Bir daru lekań goḍhanakana ॥koṅ॥~Ṉengań napū̃i bangaya,~Mat́ būrū mat́ sakam lekań batariānah ॥koṅ॥
48~Ḍinḍa redom jarama redom, Ṉhapanum,~Boṛo redo Ṉhapanum sunūm jorotan ॥koṅ॥~Non nanam, noponanam,~Boṛo redo Ṉhapanum tuḍūnko tūka tan ॥koṅ॥
49~Tatań tikiṅ, jihań tikiṅ,~Chūḍhūkiṅ bonga tan goṛe, sasang banoha ॥koṅ॥~Sasang nakiṅ namehan, būlūṅ nakiṅ namehan,~Chūṭū nagoy nirihan,~Nūḍū̃i boleahan ॥koṅ॥
50~Nender burū reaṛi misingi jeṭe tichi, lolote,~Nekelan tana |k koṅ॥~Kana napui jeṭe, akana napui lolo,~Misiṅ go, laigo renge, dah go tentaṅ teha~Nekelan tana ॥koṅ॥
51~Nendor piṛi piṛite,~Hoy ho chire; gama, dudūgar tana ॥koṅ॥~Kana napūi noyo, akana napui gama,~Misiṅ here horen senotan, hoyo dūdūgar ॥koṅ॥
52~Būido senotan Barań,~Nūli baṛa chetanete būido senotan ॥koṅ॥~Chiṭṭi kulai ben Barań,~Nūli mata dipilaṅ chiṭṭi kulaiben ॥koṅ॥~Kaben chiṭṭi kulai redo Barań,~Kuṭi nūli sūBarańh tol gojenah ॥koṅ॥॥²
53~Nale disūm dona misiṅ,~Jol beṛa gea misiṅ jolajagada ॥koṅ॥॥~Nape disūm doja misiṅ,~Rūgūt́ beṛa gea misiṅ ṭekora geaha ॥koṅ॥
54~Kūda nikir danḍika, chilikay,~Chili biliha kaben baṅṛasi ॥koṅ॥~Darū chetan cheṅṛe menaḱć, koto-kotoy,~Chal baṛana, kaben toṭiha ॥koṅ॥

55~Dah do dah do, tentaṅ hintan,~Laido, laido, rengehiṅ tan,~Chimin saning reha repeṛeh, dahado namoha ॥koṅ॥²~Dah do namohago Barań,~Raja kore pukūri dai do namoha ॥koṅ॥~Rani kore bandelare dah do namo ha~Nihatih geh sanaṅiṅ,~Chakatiṅ geh mohanĩya,~Raja kore pukūri dah do ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥~Rani kore bandela dah do ranjet́ jan |k koṅ॥~(Barań go) chimin mate seteṅ ha dah do ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥~Nesai sari, bah pari, chimin mate seteṅha dahado~Ranjet́ jan ॥koṅ॥

56~Chetan pukūri, latar pukari,~Pan sakam doja bare lodobekena ॥koṅ॥~Dikū non tan recham, pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥~Raja non tan recham, pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥॥~Nesai sari, bapari dikū non tan rechama~Pan dom jojoma ॥koṅ॥

57~Nengań, napū̃y, menaḱć redo,~Rūmatūlay, rūmatūlay, kaji seṭerah ॥koṅ॥~Nengań, napū̃y, bangaya,~Rūm tūlay, rūmatūlay, kaji banoha ॥koṅ॥~Rūmatūlay, rūmatūlay kaji banoha ॥koṅ॥~Nehasari, kenajah, Balećbareń ॥koṅ॥~Bapari, kenajai Balećbareń॥

58~Ṉamdoja munḍa nera,~Būrū diri, noharado kam sesenah ॥koṅ॥~Saiū saga, noharado kam sesenah॥~Nengam, napūm, ṭaikena,~Buru diri noharadom nūja pachūṛa ॥koṅ॥~Saiū saga noharadom, niraja sesenah ॥koṅ॥~Nesari kena jah Balećbareń ॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ ॥koṅ॥

59~Meaḍege Balećbareń, kinjiri raja,~Bheṭa beṭa teben dira dirana ॥koṅ॥~Bheṭa kiṅ chibin, kaben beṭakiṅ ॥koṅ॥~Samaṛom ganḍū rikiṅ rakabejanah ॥koṅ॥~Nesai, sari, bahapari,~Samaṛom ganḍū rikiṅ rakabejana॥
60~tū non koh tūrūiha, turūiha,~Sega non koh moṛea moṛea,~Sirma janūm jang chako jomatana,~Notereko le choṭe, leh choṭe॥

61~Ṉaben doja Balećbareń,~Ber benḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥~Ṭońa tapa kel, kel,~Kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥॥~Dolaṅ seno hago Barań,~Dolaṅ biraḍago Barań~Berabenḍoṅ ber ber kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥~Ṭońa tapa kel kel kaben nekelan ॥koṅ॥

62~Banda kotem senoredo,~Ṉoṛaḱn kotem senoredo,~Salūkat́ baṛa Barań, toṭaa darań ben ॥koṅ॥~Kaben toṭaa daharańado, kaben beṭa daharańado,~Munḍa koh racha nuṭar baṛayaṅ,~Toṭagosoyaha ॥koṅ॥~Kolam lekan, rachare,~Chiṛa bapaḍeh ॥koṅ॥॥~Nehasari kenajah Balećbareń ॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kenajah ḍūla misĩ. ॥koṅ॥

63~Barem racha poṛoso,~Nende sakam lena, punḍi, sakam-jana,~Sabin buginah ॥koṅ॥~Chetanete lipi, goh let́a,~Latarete noyo, goh let́a,~Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń ॥koṅ॥~Nesai sari, bahapari.~Johakan lipi, torosa, naṭa natuṛiń ॥koṅ॥

64~Sohaṛopo, soṛopote,~Ranchi soṛopote.~Gelabar sao, nomineko, bahalejanah ॥koṅ॥~Chinḍih koi biḍeha,~Durabin koh neleha,~Danḍa koh tamea,~Jinjirih koh noh raha.~Mūka, mūkateko, seṭerelenah ॥koṅ॥~Bita, bittateko, seṭerelenah॥~Mongol mūndi(sihabūm) sima reko seṭerelenah ॥koṅ॥~Noṛo-noṛoheko panachaket́a ॥koṅ॥~Biga bigayahako ṭakayaheket́ah ॥koṅ॥²~Nihatihaṅ geh sanaṅhi, chakatihaṅ geh mohanĩya,~Noṛo noṛo-heko, pana chaket́ah ॥koṅ॥~Biga bigayahako - ṭakayaheket́ah॥

65~Bakaṛi jangi jangite,~Tiramitia karama kalūṭi natińetana ॥koṅ॥~Naloreh chirū sanḍim keche kechenah ॥koṅ॥~Tiramitia karama kaluṭi natiṅ hetana ॥koṅ॥~Nerame nelangateh, doramo dolaṅ teh, doramo saṅṛi doy,~Karama kokotet́ ॥koṅ॥~Dharama kokotet́ ॥koṅ॥

66~Nete putam ranado,~Diri richi, darureh gugūchūḍū̃iha ॥koṅ॥~Kana napūi, diri,~Kana napūi daru,~Jojoko, rūmbūlayareh guguchuḍuṅiha ॥koṅ॥~Nūli koh rumbū̃lay reh gugūchūḍū̃iha.~Bareń honaṅ menaḱć redo, toṭe gasar meha chahe diri putam ॥koṅ॥~Tere goso meha, chahe, daru putam ॥koṅ॥~Nehasari kena jah Balećbareń ॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ ॥koṅ॥
67~Disūmedo gūle, gūle, rajedo mele mele,~Disūm chire, barengom nihatiń tan ॥koṅ॥~Neṅhaṅ mena recha Barań,~Disumedo Barań goy tinūlemeha ॥koṅ॥~Napūṅ mena recha Barań,~Rajedo barengoy kūlehemeha ॥koṅ॥

68~Bale singi tikin jana,~Bale chanḍūa ponai jana,~Nūkūrihatań singabonga, seday napū̃i do ॥koṅ॥~Nūkurihatań singabonga, seday nengań doh॥~Chūilah kiṅ-senoy hana, chūilabano,~Nida reha kumu rikiṅ bageh ket́ीhaṅ ha ॥koṅ॥~Bheṭa kiń gehań metam,~Tebah kiṅh, gehań metam,~Bheṭayan somayareh, seday Ṉapuń menateh tiṛiṅ sabiha ॥koṅ॥~Tebayan dipilire, seday nengań menete kaḍhań sabiha koṅ॥~Nehasari kena jah bale misiṅ ॥koṅ॥~Bahapari kena jah ḍūla misiṅ॥
69~Bale redo, ḍūla redo, dūbi kūṭi,~Jobarah leka sayatem nehalaha ॥koṅ॥~Nara jaṉań, daru jaṉań, kudako,~Nikiradanḍika lekam chemer chemera ॥koṅ॥
70~Jonom ken, nengado,~Jonom ken napūdo,~Chimin saning, sirima sorogeriha ॥koṅ॥²~Dūkūreho bangaya.~Sūkū reho bangaya,~(singabonga)~Saro, barohay, bakaṛa tana ॥koṅ॥~Kapajitana ॥koṅ॥
71~Buru disūm noṛoko,~Sarajom baṛa teko baṛanakanah ॥koṅ॥~Piṛi disūm noṛoko,~Bokom baṛa tirasi bisi teko baṛa naka na ॥koṅ॥
72~Hora ko natom tiril sakam,~Nindi kote bangala kote kapajitana ॥koṅ॥~Puti sakam saban koṛa, neṅnde chatom saban koṛa,~Nenga, napū, kajido chūilam manatiṅ ॥koṅ॥
73~Neram nagutan Barań,~Risa risa boṛoān neram nagu tan ॥koṅ॥~Kań bodolena Barań~Risa risa boṛoān neharare kań bodolen ॥koṅ॥~Jūṛi menaḱćahago Barań,~Nende nende sepeṛet́ juṛi menaḱćaha ॥koṅ॥

247~Kūnḍam merem japa japa,~Salandi rem japa japa,~Say say tem neling tem danaṅ hen tana ॥koṅ॥~Say say tem neling tem darna hen tana॥.~Jiṛi kūsi mena redo,~Mon raji mena redo,~Hujū len teh tiṛi re, kachim sabińa ॥koṅ॥~Hujūt len teh tiṛireh kachim sabińa॥~Pinda sutūi mayaṅ kore kachim gatińa ॥koṅ॥~Pinda sutūi mayaṅ kore kachim gatińa..~Jiṛi kūsi bano redo, mon kūsi bano redo,~Tiṛiara paraboti nalom sabińa ॥koṅ॥~Tiṛiara paraboti nalom sabińa..

248~Ṉamdom senotan, saning disūma~Kaji natū̃i mego, jūṛiṅ, chūilam rūāाha ॥koṅ॥~Jih reh nūḍūṅ tań, mego jūṛi, nalom bagińa. ॥koṅ॥~Saning riha sing bonga,~Komol baṛa prem do kage bageha ॥koṅ॥~Ṉaben nūṛ, nūṛ teh, dobisor baṭinaleka jiha~Doh loloń ha ॥koṅ॥

249~Jiṛi kūsi mena redo, monaraji mena redo,~Nalaṅ seno, noraregeṅ duṛab tangi meha ॥koṅ॥~Karem seneja boderedo, baremekom borotere,~Naṭihachi, nora reṅh, nonola tūsraha. ॥koṅ॥~Naṭihachi, nora re, no nola tūaha..~Norań, naḍem meneredo, kareng nelaḍam meneredo,~Nonol geda jūṛing gom, nel nidiha ॥koṅ॥~Ṉoṛaḱ, duharem beṭakere, nale racham manḍa kere,~Nipi nipi guṭi dah koh, neme daromam ॥koṅ॥~Nipi nipi guṭi dah koh neme daromama..

250~Sūna kote jolopi, rūpa kote kajoli,~Dikū lekan Kuṛi doh, kajam namanah ॥koṅ॥~Dikū lekan Kuṛi doh; kajam namanah..~Halate mūr bah, halate nedel bah,~Kis-mate, surū sūta bale koronjo ॥koṅ॥~Kis-mate, surū sūta bale koronjo..~Hatana joh ḍerayan, jibon ḍerayan ॥koṅ॥~Sarajom bah gosoyahan, jibon gosoyahana..

251~Jūṛiṅ racha nūli baṛa, tirasi bisi baṛa lena~Mon kūsi geh ॥koṅ॥~Tirasi bisi baṛa len mon kūsi geh॥~Sabin mūli baṛa lena,~Tala masa kotoreh baṛa banoha ॥koṅ॥~Tala masa kotoreh baṛa banoha..~Kay gamay, pūkaḍeh redo,~Nūli mata dipilaṅ dili~Kaben dili kūlaṅe redo,~Met́ mocha jaket́ah kalaṅ nepelah ॥koṅ॥~Met́ mocha jaket́ah kalaṅ nepelaha..

252~Nimin jeṭe nimin lolo,~Bakaṛire jenga bah maete goso jan ॥koṅ॥~Bakaṛire jenga bah maeteh gosojana..~Sing bonga kaji let́a,~Paraboti dūḍharete dobū senoha ॥koṅ॥~Paraboti dūṛar do,~pūl chondon nidi kete, dobū senoha..

253~Nama sundar, cheharado,~Ratti om tat́, kamadeb barabari ॥koṅ॥~Landa, jagar, menahḱ tam chamakadūri,~Prem tegem baihakan, sari Balań ॥koṅ॥ ²~Joh lena chim, bah lenam, nisūm sūndori ॥koṅ॥~Joh lena chim, bah lenam, nisūm sūndori॥.~Sancha richim dūl lenam, nisūm sūndori॥

254~Din somay bano leka, nara sagen torosam siṅha~Sūba jan I koṅ.~Nara sagen torosam sing sūba jana..~Siṅh sūba jan rehom, daru sūba jan rehom,~Sirima sakam do jūṛiṅ, goso tegeha ॥koṅ॥~Sirima sakam do jūṛiṅ, goso tegeha॥.~Jūṛim kona beṭa tamareh,~Landa sea temehako mono dukūgeh ॥koṅ॥~Landa sẽa temehako mono dukūgeha..

255~Noṛomo tabū, nasa noṛomo,~Jibon tabū, noyo jibon,~Nen jibon mena tebū, rasikatū ha ॥koṅ॥~Nen jibon mena tebū, rasikatū ha॥.~Nen noṛomo, nasa loh, nasa misabaha ॥koṅ॥~Nen jibon, noyo loh, noyo misabaha॥

256~Hagań somay bodol jan,~Briṭis koa rajoreha~Bidya maresal ho akan, marabū neto nah ॥koṅ॥~Bidya maresal ho akan, marabū neto naha..~Paṛab dobū paṛab tana, neto dobū netonatana,~Disūm haga bugin doh, kabū būdditan ॥koṅ॥~Disūm haga bugin doh, kabū budditana..

257~Buru kote bakaṛi h akan.~Gaḍa kote jangihakan,~Nimin sūndir disumerebū jonomakanah ॥koṅ॥~Nimin sūndor disūmerebū jonomakanah..~Toha gotom haṛitana, jome nūha mena keṭe,~Nimin sūndor disūmerebū jonomakanah ॥koṅ॥~Nimin sūndor disūmerebū jonomakanah॥~Sona kote ūm akan, rūpa kone singarakan,~Nimin sūndor disūmerebū jonomakanah ॥koṅ॥~Nimin sūndor disūmerebū jonomakanaha.

258~Sūnūm metat́ pinḍigireh,~Sasaṅ hetat́ pinḍigireh,~Jaṭi lekan kagajoben nitireleḍah ॥koṅ॥~Jaṭi lekan kagajoben nitireleḍaha..~Dhon chigo maraṅha, buddi maraṅ ha ॥koṅ॥ ²~Buddim netoy recha jūṛiṅ, don do rakaboh ॥koṅ॥~Pahiṭim netoy recha jūṛiṅ ṭaka seṭerah॥
259~Kūda nikir gule gule,~Bah nikir mele mele,~Kuṭi redonah, chiripi nakū chara banoha ॥koṅ॥.~Kuṭi redonah, chiripi nakū chara banoha..~Ṭinaṭiri, baṛãsi teko, baṛãsi benah ॥koṅ॥

260~Nape disūm do Balań, diri sūm, daru sūm, dado~Laliha ॥koṅ॥~Diri sūm, daru sūm, dado laliha..~Nale disūm do Balań, panḍū sakam goso jan dado~Nesari, gosari, leber, kodora~Dūṅ ḍas jan ॥koṅ॥~Chūṛa sagen mayate goso jan ॥koṅ॥

261~Hūṛing lekan hende chatom.~Huḍiṅ lekan punḍi rimil,~Sarigeh toraṅ sarigeh ringay rimil chiha.. Ko॥~Sarigeh toraṅ sarigeh ringay rimil chiha..~Ringay remay ringay toraṅ,~Nakal remay nakale toraṅ,~Jaṭi lekan bihlakan disumering ha ॥koṅ॥~Jaṭi lekan bihalakan disumering ha..~Sona leka ūm akan disum kūṭi rińa ॥koṅ॥~Sona leka ūm akan disum kūṭi rińa..

262~Jūṛiṅ heko gatiṅ heko, nimin bugin banam saṛitan,~Rutu saṛitan ॥koṅ॥.~Nimin bugin, banam saṛitan, Rutu saṛitana..~Jūṛing goh, nirajol, nirajol nakaṛado kalaṅ~Boloha ॥koṅ॥~Jūṛing goh, nirajol nirajol nakaṛado kalaṅ boloha..~Kita jol kita jol donago, jūṛiṅ kalaṅ sabanah ॥koṅ॥~Kita jol, kita jol donago jūṛiṅ, kalaṅ sabanaha..

263~Nengań tikiṅ, napū̃y tikiṅ,~Nokon tikiṅ senojan munḍige banoha ॥koṅ॥~Nokon tikiṅ senojan, patageh banoha..~Sorogeṅh nel kiha, sorogo sūmaḍah..~Pataleṅ nelakiha, patala sūmaḍah..~Noyo goh misa jibon dona, noyo misa jan ॥ ko॥~Nasa misa noṛomoh dona, nasa misa jana..

264~Sali burū sali sakam,~Taṭaṅ hetanah Barań, napiletanaha. ॥koṅ॥~Gonoṅ sati mena redo niraja koṭoṅ heben Barań, senaja~Koṭoṅ ben ॥koṅ॥~Gonoṅ sati bano redo, nūsa tere barengo rūhaṛabena.~Nūsa tere Barań go rūhaṛa bena.I koṅ..
265~Bareń racha bah rehaṛi, pamapal non leka chaha~Jaṅ diriyeteha ॥koṅ॥~Paspal non leka chah jandiriyeteha॥~Nisū sibilah Barań,~Nūtū tare Barań nisū sibilah ॥koṅ॥

266~Nender burū johalare, jūṛi tena naralen, jūṛi nepeḍom ॥ ॥koṅ॥~Jūṛi tena naralen jūṛi nepeḍoma.I~Isū saṛi ha koṅ,~Jūṛi Rutu bale reh nisū saṛiha ॥koṅ॥~Jūṛi Rutu balereh nisū saṛiha॥.~Buru rikiṅ ṉoroṅhe, burū rūmoloha ॥koṅ॥~Beṛa rikiṅ ṉoroṅhe beṛa rūmoloha.~Aesai goṛe bahapari, mukabitta aepenḍom Rutu reja,~Bareńo jibon senoyahan ॥koṅ॥~Mukabitta aepenḍom Rutu reja barengo jibon senoyahana

267~Chanḍuḱ ko do Chanḍuḱ koh,~Ṉipil kodo Ṉipil koh,~Jojo sakam batariko jonomakanah ॥koṅ॥~Jojo sakam batariko jonomakanaha..~Nimin jeṭe, nimin lolo,~Chetanere koh jonomakanah ॥koṅ॥²~Disūm tabū jayapal siṅh, banachab rūṛay ben ॥koṅ॥~Lele koh leka būh nūḍin recha, Gaḍa toloha ॥koṅ॥~Lele koh leka būh jūṛin recha, būrū rapūḍoha. ॥koṅ॥~Kabū chakaḍoh Barań, hesa sakam, pan sakam, kabū~Jojo mah ॥koṅ॥~Hesa sakam, pan sakam kabū jojomaha..~Tiril sakam biṛi redo kabū chakaḍoh ॥koṅ॥~Tiril sakam biṛi redo kabū chakaḍoha..

268~Dinḍa redom, jarama redom, Rutu, banam lagit́ Barań~Dinagem senoha ॥koṅ॥~Rutu banam lagit́ Barań dinagem senoha॥~Rutu tedo, banam tedo, kaben nasūloh ॥koṅ॥~Rutu tedo, banam tedo, kaben nasūloha..~Mit́ bitta note Barań kara somaneh ben ॥koṅ॥~Mit́ bitta note Barań kara somaneh bena..~Karago soman tarem bare,~Din munḍi, bochor munḍi dinagem jomeha. ॥koṅ॥

269~Nai kodope naikih tana,~Munḍa dope munḍa tana,~Nape ṉoṛaḱ korena Barań ṉańadoy dasinah ॥koṅ॥~Nape ṉoṛaḱ korena Barań, ṉańadoń dasinaha..~Kape dasiṅ reho Barań, munḍa kore talab ṭaka doha~Kań retap peh ॥koṅ॥~Munḍa kore talaṕ ṭaka do kań reaḱ peha..~ā̃y doń dasinah Barań, jibon nasūl Manḍi,~Lagit́ ṉań doń dasinah ॥koṅ॥~Jibon nasūl Manḍi lagit́, ṉań doń dasinah..

270~Leṅ leṅ daru re, bore bore daru re, nola gecha Balańem~Chakaḍatū ḍiń॥. Ko.~Nocha gecha Balańem chakaḍatū ḍińa..~Nańadoy senoha Balań~Nape ṉoṛaḱ duhar doń senaja bapaḍaha ॥koṅ॥~Nape ṉoṛaḱ duhar doń senaja bapaḍaha..~Natū kań nelat́ redo,~Disūm kań nelat́ redo,~Natū munḍa nutūm teṅh kuli nameha ॥koṅ॥~Natū munḍa nutūm teṅh kuli nameha..~Nape ṉoṛaḱ beṭah kehareṅ, nape rachań teba keh re,~Kolom lekan racha reṅh senaja ninū̃ha॥ ko॥~Kolom lekan racha reṅh senaja ninū̃ha..

271~Buru disūm nohaṛoko,~Maṭa sūra jom teko lepe ḍore tan॥ ko॥~Maṭa sūra jom teko lepe ḍore tana..~Piṛi disūm Kuṛi koh,~Leper naṛa jom teko lamaka lanḍūṅ tan ॥koṅ॥~Leper naṛa jom teko lamaka lanḍūṅ tan॥

272~Sida sida do jūṛiṅ,~Maṭi hare dumūr daa lekam kaji kapaji॥~Maṭi hare dumar dat lekam kaji kapaji॥~Nimir gapa dogo jūṛiṅ,~Neṭaa noṛo kaji telaṅ kecheṛatanah ॥ ko॥~Neṭaa noṛo kaji telaṅ kecheṛatanahaI.~Namachi nayar seno tan,~Nańachi chanaṕ seno tana~Sorogaredo mūsiṅ dolaṅ bepeṭageha ॥koṅ॥~Bepeṭayahan somay redo, sida jūṛĩmenate tiṛireh sabińa~Meh ॥koṅ॥~Sida jūṛiṅ menete johar telań meh ॥koṅ॥~Sida jūṛi menete johar telań meh॥

273~Dikū koh haṭihate, rajakoh haṭihate,~Hai goṛe tańe Barań doko, siṅket́िtay ha ॥koṅ॥~Hai goṛe tań Barań doko, siṅket́िtaya ha..~Dobū senoha sepaṛi ko, dobū senoha,~Baripada lalasite dobū senoha ॥koṅ॥~Baripada lalasite dobū senoha..

274~Mage tanay menete,~Poroṕ tanay menete,~Nape natu mage nelate ṉań doń nijūlen ॥koṅ॥.~Nape natu mage nelate ṉań doy nijūlena..~Maile gele batari Kuṛi,~Gulab baṛa, jūngūt́ jūngūt́,~Namage nel nelete, niṅ doń seṭer len. ॥koṅ॥~Namage nel nelete, niṅ doń seṭer lena..~Kadal sakam gipal gopol,~Sarū sakam jūr jūr,~Ganga Gaḍa nakū lekam gial goyola ॥koṅ॥~Ganga Gaḍa nakū lekam gial goyola..~Marachi mata jūngūt́ jūngūt́,~āṭal baṛa sapa Kuṛi,~Pukūri kūṭi kot lekam dingaṕ, dongobah ॥koṅ॥~Pukūri kūṭi kot lekam dingab, dongoaha..

275~Ṉamdoja dinḍa Kuṛi,~Noṛo sala salate, dinem chabatan ॥koṅ॥.~Noṛo sala salate, dinem chabatana..~Karem namiha Kuṛi, sengel julū nipi nipi sepeṛeḍa~Karem namiha ॥koṅ॥~Din somay chabayahan re, ūmar somay chabayahana~Reh, nokoy jaket́ kuṛi koh kako jūṛibena ॥koṅ॥ ²

276~Ṉamadom jonom len Barań,~Maraṅ burū dirogo naṭal namadom jonom lena. ॥koṅ॥~Maraṅ burū dirigo naṭal namadom jonomalen॥.~Nań doń jonom len Balań,~Nūṛiṅ burū sūṛa sagen nindoy jonomalena..~Nūṛiṅ burū sūṛa sagen nindoy jonomalena.I

277~Kuṭi rehana rimiliṅ,~Tala rehana rimiliṅ,~Neha do Barań, neha do gamay rimil chih ॥koṅ॥~Neha do Barań, neha do ṭer rimil chiha..~Gamareh mate gamayaha, ṭerareh mate ṭereha,~Ṉengań mena recha goh nengań nihatiń ॥koṅ॥~Napū̃y mena recha goh, napū̃y nihatiṅha..~Kunḍam salandih reh japakanate meḍada joroyaha ॥koṅ॥~Kunḍam salandih reh japakanate meḍadaa joroyaha॥

278~Dinḍa redo balań, jarama redo balań,~Boṛo redo balań sunūm jorotan ॥koṅ॥~Boṛo redo balań sunūm jorotana.~Non nanam noponanam,~Boṛo redo balań tuṛaṅ ko tūka tan ॥koṅ॥~Boṛo redo balań tuṛaṅ ko tūkatana.
279~Laido laido renge hiṅ tan,~Dado dado tetaṅ hiṅ tan,~Noko kore rai rankan dah do beṭabaha ॥koṅ॥~Noko kore rai rankan dah do beṭabaha॥~Dah do beṭabaha nicha buṭa kūnt kore dah doha~Beṭab ha ॥koṅ॥

280~Dinṛa redom, jarama redo, balań,~Mūchi dūmaṅ talareham niraja sūsūnah ॥koṅ॥~Mūchi dūmaṅ talarem niraja sūsūnah॥~Non nanam, nopo nanam,~Nera kaṭa sūbah rem seta kunūchah ॥koṅ॥~Nera kaṭa sūbah rem seta kunūchah॥

281~Racham, dacham nakipana,~Sohan sunūm bangali doti,~Dikū koṛa jaket́ay baparike nah ॥koṅ॥~Dikū koṛa jaket́ay bapari ke naha..~Boṛo tam do sūkūri dumabū,~Sūkūri koko gupi teha,~Hay goṛe tań narasire met́ mocha chirem neloha ॥koṅ॥~Hay goṛe tań narasire met́ mocha chirem neloha.~Nelen tanam ḍū̃l joha,~Chinan tanam jūhūr samang,~Chimin chiminam, nele netanah ॥koṅ॥~Chimin chiminam, nele netanah ॥koṅ॥

282~Baṛa sūndor nelete, baṛa rasi hayateh,~॥ rasika nurū bihūretanah ॥koṅ॥~Rasika nurū bihūretanaha..~Tay bah reh dubihan, baṛa rasi haya te,~Singi nasūr dipilaṅ baṛa richūb jan ॥koṅ॥~Singi nasūr dipilaṅ baṛa richūb jan..~Goṭa singi baṛa rege tai jana,~Bando tere goso jan baṛa, jibon natūyahan ॥! Koṅ..~Bando tere goso jan baṛa, jibon natūyana..~Baṛa sūndor nelete, baṛa rasi hayate,~Dubiyan rasika nurū, jibon natuyan ॥koṅ॥~Dubiyan rasika nurū jibon natuyan.~Yena menate, dinḍa koṛa, dinḍa kuṛi,~Kaliyug reha prem ros reh nalom naṭanah ॥koṅ॥~Kaliyug reha prem ros reh nalom naṭanaha..

283~Kachi paiṭi buginachi,~Kadan paiṭi bugin,~Landa beke beke jiṛim sukū jan ॥koṅ॥~Landa beke beke jiṛim sukū jana..~Paṛa, roṛaṅ buginachi,~Dumbū, sūtang bugin,~Pati babam nala let́ karem sukū jan ॥koṅ॥~Pati babam nala let́, karem sukūjan..

284~Barūko nikir melena mele,~Kudako nikir gulena gūle,~Nicha kochi, chingaṛi kochi, nūja pachūṛi ॥koṅ॥~Nicha kochi, chingaṛi kochi, nūja pachūṛi..~Jalom mena redo nah balań,~Ganari mena redo nah balań,~Nicha chingaṛi kodona Balań ganari torosa~Kom ॥koṅ॥~Nicha chingaṛi kodona Balań ganari torosama..
285~Ṉaben doā Balećbareń,~Birabitar rehaṛi ben noro nirińa ॥koṅ॥~Buru bitar rehaṛiben noro nirińa.~Kese ḍakaḍiṅhay Barań,~Ki kula kindir kula neseḍakaḍĩ. ॥koṅ॥~Kiṅ kula kindir kula neseḍakaṛĩ..
286~Masuri beṛa, kalai beṛa.~Kań landa kena misiṅ, kań jagaraken ॥koṅ॥~Kań landa bena misiṅ, kań jagarakena..~Ṭemba, ṭemba, sar do nalom nolańaha ॥koṅ॥~Birala, balaṅ, kapi doh, nalom nudūbańa..

287~Nendor piṛi pihaṛite,~Sisi kay gamayaha rimiliṅ do ॥koṅ॥~Sisi kay gamayaha rimiliṅ doh॥.~Rel chatom saban Kuṛi,~Bareń gichi kuṛim tingu tangi tan ॥ kiṅ॥~Bareń gichi kuṛim tingu tangi tana..~Chetanete noyo let́a.~Latarete noyo let́a,~Kasamar daru regem lehonekena ॥koṅ॥~Kasamar daru regem lehonekena॥.

288~Masūri beṛa, kalay beṛa,~Ṉamchire mai chari chaṭa tana ॥koṅ॥~Ṉamchire Mai Kita galaṅtana..~Dah, masūri metam redo,~Dah kalay metam redo,~Ṉote geja mai tań, notem tirubah ॥koṅ॥~Sirma geja mai tań, Sirmam sangila..~Jiam china topa tat́, notem tirūbah ॥koṅ॥~Tatam china haka tat́, Sirmam sangilaha. ॥koṅ॥~Tatam china haka tat́ Sirmam sangilaha..

289~Kibiri disumedo,~Sūkū chigo Barań, dukū namoha ॥koṅ॥~Sūkū chigo Barań, dukū namoha..~Dukū reho Barań sukū namoha ॥koṅ॥~Sukū reho Barań dukū namoha..~Chiṭṭi kulań benago Barań, gelebar singireh chiṭṭi kūlańa~Bena ॥koṅ॥~Gelebar singi reh chiṭṭi kūlań bena..~Chiṭṭi kaben kūlań redo Barań,~Surū baba būṭa reṅ tol gojenah ॥koṅ॥~Surū baba būṭa reṅ tol gojenaha..

290~Disumedo gulegule, Rájido melemele,~Hayre tań Misińgo Disum lótana ॥koṅ॥~Hayrh tań Misińgo Disum baletana..~Lórema ló tan, balerema baletan,~Hayre tań Misińgo dikū naṛadiha ॥koṅ॥~Hay reh tań mising goh gaja bajaṅṛa..~Dikू naṅṛa din redom, raja banjaṛan redom,~Niyoṅ gere Barań goh dili kūlań ben ॥koṅ॥~Niyoṅ gere bare goh kaji kūlań bena..~Kaben dili kūlań redo, kaben kaji kūlań redo,~Ṉaben gecha Barań goh, disūm nūmi hota ॥koṅ॥~Ṉaben gecha Barań goh, disūm nūmihotrr॥

296~Nape disūm do jūṛiṅ, nepa terepań netayaha banda pukūrigeha~Nepa terepań hetay ha banda pukūrigeha..~Ṉoṛaḱn tepe seno redo,~Jūtapeh tegayaha jūṛiṅ, chata peh sabeha ॥koṅ॥~Jūtapeh tegayaha jūṛiṅ, chata peh sabeha॥~Jojom dipilantr ho, cham chini geha jūṛiṅ,~Kobi torakari ॥koṅ॥~Nale disūm do jūṛiṅ, panḍū sakam gasar jana~Daado ringa jan ॥koṅ॥~Jojom dipi lantrो,~Daa Manḍi geha jūṛiṅ, ṭika bulūṅ geh. ॥koṅ॥~Datar Manḍi geha jūṛiṅ, maṭa sūra geh॥.

298~Nesa sakam dūrakūnḍa, baṛi sakam dūrakūnḍa,~Sarigichi dūrakūnḍam sepaṛikena ॥koṅ॥~Sarigichi dūrakūnḍam sepaṛikenaa..~Sepaṛi doben sepaṛikena, sepaṛi nala jota doko~Nemat́ bena chih ॥koṅ॥~Sepaṛi nala jota doko nemat́ bena chiha..~Nem doko nemat́ liṅha, chet́ doko cheḍat́ liṅha,~Raja kore nanḍadireṅ tegah rochot́ ket́ ॥koṅ॥~Dikū kore paṛandireṅ kulasū rochot́ ket́..

299~Nako pako birakoh talare, mela meli tanḍire,~Dolaṅ dolaṅ metam redom, tingu tangińa ॥koṅ॥~Dolaṅ dolaṅ metam redom, tingu tangińa..~Nape ṉoṛaḱ telaṅārachi, nale ṉoṛaḱ teh ॥koṅ॥ ²~Racha korelaṅ manḍa kehare,~Chihamate somodoni chinakoh metalaṅ ॥koṅ॥~Chihamate somodoni chinakoh metalaṅ.~Nalo kako rūh laṅ re, nalo kako tam laṅ re,~Nora nako jagarah laṅ kah, disum kote laṅ. ॥koṅ॥~Nora nako jagarah laṅ kah, disum kote laṅ.. 315~Munḍakoaḱ Bakaṛire, Danikoaḱ Bakaṛire bar joṛa~Gulaṕbaha koṛo tea ॥koṅ॥~Kuṭimuli jangiakan, sabinmuli bakaṛiakan, sabina~Baṛa baṛas redo..~Sabin baṛa puṭao redo ponai chaṅnḍu nidaḱ leka~Bakai mara sal ॥koṅ॥~Ponai chaṅnḍu nidaḱ leka bakai marasal॥~Hayre tań praṇ pyari, hay chuṛamuṛi bangali kuṛimai~Lekam landa landaya ॥koṅ॥~Bangali kuṛi mai lekam landa landaya॥

316~Upalbaha dinḍa Juḍiń, Ṉaṭalbaha sapa juṛiń macha~Muchu landaea juṛiṅ nidimeṅ sanaiṅ ॥koṅ॥~Macha muchū landaya juṛiṅ nidi meṅ sanainga.~Sarū sakam sapa juḍiń salukat́-baṛa sapa juṛińa~Ganga Gaḍa naku lekam bikan bokona. ॥koṅ॥~Ganga Gaḍa nakū lekam bikan bokona..

317~Mutul kore tiguntar kanare, salandi kore jap akante saya~Sayatem ne liṅh he tayaṅ seno ām ॥koṅ॥~Say sayatem neling hetayaṅ seno āma.~Paṛaor tan resage juṛiń, kami tan resogeṅ juṛiṅh bara~Bari nidaḱ singi namage niatiṅha ॥koṅ॥.~Bara bari nidaḱ singi namage niatiṅh॥~Lutur redo sonamena, mayang redo bangali saṛi, seni tanaya~Jonor jonora.I~Hujū tanam gial gopol nameng nele nelete danda giḍi~Jan ॥koṅ॥~Namage nele nelate danda giḍi jan..

319~Kadal sakam gial gopol, malachi mata jungūt́ pyari~Jiṛi kusi mena redo tingu tangi meṅ ॥koṅ॥~Jiṛi kusi menaredo tingu tangi meṅ.~Ṉamdo na kisan kuṛi tayaṅ, nam do na danir beṭi tayaṅ~Rengeṅ koṛa men resarr tiṛi sabing meṅ ॥koṅ॥~Renge koṛa menares tiṛi sabing meṅ..~Tiṛi kaben sabing redo, gitrutehaṅ chaba tan, jibana~Seno ā ॥koṅ॥~Giuteń chaba tan jiban seno āra॥

320~Nel akan disum tabu, baihakana disum tabu.~Nenga napu janm jiban naguha kayate disum bu~Honoratana ॥koṅ॥~Nela tabu juṛi ko, nela tabu bo koko.~Nenga napu sea kaji nimin bugina I koṅ.~Jaha kote seno res, jeta kote seno resa.~Nenga napu sea kaji kagena beṭao ā ॥koṅ॥

324~Sisure do ḍula redo,~Nenga koyong sukute toā̃ye nunu kena ॥koṅ॥.~Hara janay maraṅ g janay, bisba paiṭi paiṭi rege~Somay chaba tan ॥koṅ॥~Boṛo bale panḍu jana,~Meḍe hire hire te kań nele jom ॥koṅ॥~Disumere Siṅgbonga namage nega namage napu,~Disumere Siṅgbonga koyoṅ heleme ॥koṅ॥~Nale menale Siṅgbonga, nama seba saṛare nale menale,~Johare taṉań siṅhabonga nich patalatalare naloma~Ningiāra ॥koṅ॥

326~Muchi dumang saṛi lena, met́ dama saṛi lena,~Bijali leka sabin muli nitire jana ॥koṅ॥~Rūmūl saṛi nayum ket́te rãasa gele naṭakar ket́te,~Nalesar genale bichar ket́ dobu senoā.ḱ koṅ.~Lutur tele nayum ket́a mon tele bichar ket́a,~Chekana mate saṛi tana disum dokal tan ॥koṅ॥ ²~Nale seṭer lena Balań, nale nujū lena Balań,~Nape racha te Balań nale nujū lena ॥koṅ॥~Tiṛire tale chenao bano, don bito banotar tale,~Sama tiṛiṅ kaṭate nale seṭer lena ॥koṅ॥~Seṭere len somay, tebayan dipilaṅ,~Parakomope bi lat́ le, datarape nemat́ le ॥koṅ॥~Rãasa samay teba lena, sabin baja saṛiyana,~Saben muli sobene paṛa nitire jana ॥koṅ॥~Tiṛi kam saṕ le redo, nahḱ kam kajiya le redo,~Tingu tele gojoā, jiban senoā. ॥koṅ॥~Mon raji mena redo, jiṛi kusi mena redo,~Misareo Balań na kajia lem ॥koṅ॥ ²

331~Bareń racha suna bakara~Bur duṛige balena suna bakara ॥koṅ॥~Kiṭu bakan tirū bakan les nage jo nakana, I koṅ..~Nesari goṛe bapari, nesari goḍe bapari,~Bareń racha suna bakara lapa luḍi badūṛi,~Sobe ṭapa gasar ket́ ॥koṅ॥

489~Nimin maraṅ danire beṭi,~Chikate mate danire beṭi boṛo aram risaā ॥koṅ॥~Chaibasa narial sunūm, haṭagamaria diring naki,~Sira sira naki en ben sobam neloā ॥koṅ॥²
490~Kali maṭi kali maṭi tiṛi redo paradesi nalom sabi~Ha. ॥koṅ॥~Tiṛi redo paradesi nalom sabiṅ ha,~Nengame doe mene ha napu medoe mene ha,~Diku bangali nelot recha āra go sanaṅ hiṅ ॥koṅ॥

491~Dinḍa redo napanum, jaram redo napanum,~Manḍo hari saṛi dom tega tega aeha ॥koṅ॥~Manḍo hari saṛi dom tega tega eha.~Noṅna nam napanum nopona nam napanum,~Noṛo kaṭasūba rem seta kunūchan ॥koṅ॥~Noṛo kaṭa sūba rem seta kunūchana.
492~Chiāraḱ chiha gutūrahon, chiha chiha chepor Hon,~Nanga ko disume do bugi tana chi,~Bugi doko bugi tana kesari sakam mete daaraḱ ko~Nutana ॥koṅ॥ ²
493~Nape dope kisan tana, nape dope dani tana,~Chikate mate danire beṭi boṛoam risa jan, ॥koṅ॥~Chai basa narial sunūm haṭagamaria diring naki,~Sira siram naki ha kaete sobab neloā ॥koṅ॥²

494~Nora natom tiril daru,~Hindi kote bangali kote, kapaji tana.~Suhal muhal kodona mising suhal dengaṅe ben,~Kaben suhal dengaeṅ redo, kaben jobaṕ dengaeṅ redo,~Balena mising menate kareṅ metaben, kareṅ metabena..

495~Luturajapa son akan ko, met́ mocha son akan ko,~Dehale halai sing bonga bayana nagu kom,~Ṉote na topor doti dona seai loṭaehana.~Mayang redo bangali doti, tiṛi redo pital rūtu,~Boṛo redo soṛan sunum, dikuna dikum soṛa na jokana~Nusan ben ॥koṅ॥ ²

496~Chetan pukūri salukat́ baṛa,~Latar pukūri salukat́ baṛa nitirakan,~Jodorakan punḍisalukaḍa.~Noyahar koṭoṅ ben Balań ḍebel beṭae bena.~Noyahar doben noyahar koṭoṅ, ḍebel doben ḍebel beṭae,~Tiṛi na jiling dipilando nikir talareh ॥koṅ॥ ²

497~Din somay bano leka, somay chaba tan leka,~Naran sangom torosamadaru sua jana.~Ṉamdo Balań daru suba jan, nam do juḍing siṅh suba jan,~Nańa nuḍūṅ do juḍing nokoe nare hae nida singi juḍiṅ kinga~Namage nuṛaṅ ² te,~Namage nuḍū ha.~Nida singi juṛi king meḍada joroya kumbaḍū leka bena~Ṉamliḍiṅ kumbaḍū leka ben beṭa liḍiṅ,~Naya jiban do juṛi baya natuḍĩ.~Ṉamkajing nohūm kere chiminagaṛi joka toraṅ~Namage nuḍū ॥koṅ॥~Musing nida kumūtana,~Musing nida sopn tana, jaṭi karakom tanala tala~Metana ॥koṅ॥²
498~EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
499~Ipil singi nipi nipi, Chanḍuḱ marasal jilaṕ jalaṕ,~Nimin maraṅ sarag samadoṛi, disum baṅih akan.~Kalaṅng beṭaya samadoṛi nimin bugin jagah do kalaṅnga~Beṭaya ॥koṅ॥²

500~Kalakata ranga banam, choibasa pital Rutu,~Marago misiṅ susūn ben, marago duraṅng ben,. ॥koṅ॥~Kaben dūraṅng dai redo, ābenege misingo disum umiho.~Sari toraṅng diri teko te tena, hasage jojoma ॥koṅ॥²
501~Yū0 pi skūl ben pas taṛa,~Joka jaket́ donir beṭi gean banoā ॥koṅ॥²~Chalaki taben do chahar mena chehara taben kodar leka,~Joka reó donir beṭi gean banoh.. Ko ॥²॥
502~Boṛo balem tisar tat́a,~Marag lekam singar jana hay retań babur beṭi kabena~Kapaji ॥koṅ॥~Kaben kapaji reó kaben gagati reó naben chanaṕ chanaba~Teh chiṭṭiṅ kulea koṅ ॥²॥
503~Bakaḍire gulaṕ baṛa,~Mutuṛa mutuḍa puṭanna nakana ॥koṅ॥~Mit́ sigi jeṭe let́a baṛana moyala jana ॥koṅ॥ ²
504~Engae racha bakara, āpui racha bakara,~Kiṭuṕ kan tirūb kana ॥koṅ॥~Rūi reó tame reó akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥ ²
505~Ṉaben doja Balećbareń,~Bagur baṛa rasi tedo kacha jojoro ॥koṅ॥~Engae mena rechago engae neati ॥koṅ॥~āpui mena rechago āpu neati ॥koṅ॥ ²
506~Chiṭi ki sakam suū tan ko,~Dea halai sing bonga baya hiju kom ॥koṅ॥²~āding kore Manḍi tan ko dea halai chuṭu kaṭia,~Huā hujū kom. ॥koṅ॥ ²
507~Diri chirūbo daaḱ do kere non daaḱ dogunye gunye,~Kere non, neah banko kere non dataḱ do~Duṛayan kere non nayah ko banko kere non janum teko~Rame ket́a.
508~Sangar reko ludū ha,~Sangar reko jebet́ chaba ket́ diri chirūbo daaḱ do~Kere non non sangar reko jebet́ chaba ket́. ²

509~Metam ² metam misiṅh lūpūng baṛa chuṭūkayare gutūru nona~Ko tare lena.~Napaṅh bagae menate goṛe gutūru, non do tare lena.~Neaṅh racha napaṅh racha gutūron non joṅh joṅh taharena~Ben gutūron,~Baṛi mata hesa mata gutūron joṅh joṅh tare ben gutūrona.~Baṛi mata chabayan gutūron hesa mata chabayan gutūrona~Sihisihi haṅn roro han geha gutūrona..

510~Juṛi hiṅ daru leka misiṅh juṛi nakana lang misiṅh,~Joṛa rūtu leka misiṅh juṛin akana laṅ misiṅh nengae~Bagae redo misiṅh gere goso lantrाḱ koṅ misiṅha.~Napaṅh bagay redo misiṅh ṭoṭe gosolaṅāraḱ ko misiṅh ॥ ²॥

511~Dikū dikū disum dona misiṅh, dikū totola misiṅh,~Dikū dokū naṭia do misih senate gedaeṅ misiṅh kińa.~Dikū dikū naṭia do misiṅh tikii lekalaṅ senoha.~Dikū dikū disum do misiṅh dikū totola misiha.~Raja raja naṭia do misiṅh rūchūṅ lekaṅe senohaṅ.~Raja raja naṭia do misiṅh raja papase.
512~Nimin maraṅg pritbi jaṭi leka bil akan disum bai~Kan ॥koṅ॥ ² ॥~Nehating sanahaṅ kili mili manami ko janm nakana ॥koṅ॥²
513~Ṉaben doja Balećbareń,~Aeṭa hatu mage reben koyoṅ banama ॥koṅ॥ ²~Ṉaben dojaBalećbareń,~Dhan chiyo maraṅ haṅ jiban maraṅ haṅ ॥.²॥~Dhan mena menate, jiban taṭan lena ॥koṅ॥ ²
514~Ṉaben senate norare, sona go jilib,~Kuṛi tigun akana koṅ, jute bareheṅ jute kyaha lekai bena.~Kyaha doling kyaha tai,~Nende nende gudūre danahatuḍĩ. ॥koṅ॥ ²

516~Papari natu Ṉulina juṛiṅ, baṛa tirasiya, jote jubu lae..²~Koto kotoy chalena cheṛeḱ.~Gaḍare chirapi chiril miṭing,~Marateale juṛi kiṅ toṭe lekai ben,~Marateale juṛi kiṅ bangasi lekai bena.~Ko tore chenḍeṅm toṭe lere, gaṛare chirapim bangasi lere,~Sida juṛim kodo metam nalom nekako koṅ ॥² ॥
517~Jiam tirkiṅ, tatam tikiṅ,~Chuṭuna kiṅ, bonga tan, buluṅ banoā. ॥koṅ॥~Buluṅna kiṅ namean chuṭu nirean ²,~Siday tiki jom kena pahilayate tiki jom kena~Chuṭu jilu nimir barasi bage taṛakĩ. ॥koṅ॥

518~Jan racha jetan racha,~Racha talako rena metam bonga ko menatara. ²,~Jan kunḍam jetan kunḍam kunḍam kuṭi korena juṛiṅ nage~Ko menahḱ. ²,~Jan risa jetan risa kodo bano,~Hende risa kogena juṛiṅ bonga do lagati. ²,~Jan gunḍa kodo bano jetan gunḍa kodo bano, iṭa~Gunḍa, kogena juṛiṅ punji lagati ॥koṅ॥ ²

519~Baṛa lekam puṭab lena, chanḍu lekam mulua lena,~Nocha, nochare, sokigo, tiṛi juṭit́ meṅ.~Kuṭi regena tingun meṅ, duraṅha tuńaṅ meṅ.~Chanaṕ regena gatin me netonatuń meṅ.²~Tiṛiṅ saṕ kem redo tiṛiṅ juṭit́ kem redo nisi ṭaka neme~Reo kagem jatio jatim rakaboār juṛiṅ,~Jatim rakabo, meat́ baeda mero mete.~Jatim rakabo ॥koṅ॥ ²

520~Misiṅ racha bale bakara,~Meaḍege buṭa len dõsi jo lena. ²,~Goḍeteam sanaṅ redo, nidi team sanaṅ redo,~Napuńe gecha bit́ akan Ṉapuńe kulimeṅ. ²~Nengae gecha roṛa ken nengaeṅ kuli meṅ. ²~Gono hako mene redo, satia ko mene redo,~Taṛ banda choke ko laṅ jagarakoa ॥koṅ॥²
521~Nender piṛare ṉoṛaḱ do,~Golanachi baṛa teko lunḍa netaḍa koṅ ॥ ² ॥~Chaibasa sepaṛi ko kali maṭina sahebe ko,~Baṛa nel nel teko, duraṅ hetana.~Baṛa nel nel teko taname tana, koṅ ॥ ² ॥

522~Naiki kore bakaṛi re, kisan kore bakaṛi re,~Joṛa juṛi gulaṕ baṛa koṛon akana. ²,~Kuṭi muli ko bakai tat́a, kuṭi muli ko jangi tat́a,~Kili mili rasika nurū ki biyuren tana. ²~Sabin baṛa jenga jenga, meat́ baṛa nil nil,~Sabin baṛa gena juṛiṅ, ṉań geṅhaṅ baṛaya ॥koṅ॥

523~Naki kenam supit́ kenam baṛa bakai regena sokim bolo~Nakana. ²,~Karem nemoā go saki baṛa nasi somay redo karem nemoāṅ,~Karem nemoā go soki karem nemoār,~Baṛa puṭab somay redo karem nemotara,~Baṛam nemoā soki baṛa goso somay redo baḍama~Nemoāra. ²,~Kako babaṛa, metam, kako babaṛa,~Baṛa goso somay redo kako babaṛa ॥koṅ॥²

524~Ṉaben juṛi burū parom, nali juṛi Gaḍa parom,~He juṛiṅ juṛiṅ juṛiṅ misa telaṅha ².~Ṉamadom seno tan juṛim, sani disum kotem bagenatuyeṅ tan,~Jiling disum kotem bagenatuyeṅ tana.~Chekan kusur lagit́etem bagenatuyeṅ tana.~Kaji natuyeṅ ben juṛi,~Jagaratuyeṅ ben juṛiṅ chuilam rūhaṛa ॥koṅ॥~Kaben kaji natuyeṅ redo, kaben jagaratuńe redo,~Ṉaben chanaṕ chanabete naeṅ doye senotar,. ॥koṅ॥~Kaben tingu tagi redo chataḱchomre saṕ meaeṅ, bonḍo rūṛameṅ,~Chatraḱchomre saṕ mey akanyeṅ āṛatar meṅ ॥koṅ॥²

525~Mage do senoyan, juṛiṅ mage do senoyan,~Latar disu mete mage senoyan, punḍi sadama~Chetanete mage do senoyan ॥koṅ॥~Senoa remam senoḱa Mage,~Joroṅ kore do mage beṭarūṛameṅ.~Sintu kore do mage beṭa rūṛa meṅ.~Bepeṭayan somay redo kale bagemea mage kea~Rūṛa meṅ ॥koṅ॥²

528~Bareń racha bakara kiṭuṕ akantiroṕ akan ॥koṅ॥~āpuṅi racha bakara, rūi reó tame reho akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥~Sarige ² te rūi reó tame reó akana gasaro ॥koṅ॥ ²
529~Nen nai ki ṉoṛaḱ do, nen kisan ṉoṛaḱ do,~Kuṭura chi, muta riḍiṅ hekena koṅ,~Kana napui kuṭur akana napui muta riḍiṅ h akana,~Munḍa kore toloṕ ṭaka cha riḍiṅ hekena ॥koṅ॥~Buru kote bakai akana,
530~Gaḍa kote jangi kan nimin bugin sunadara~Choṭanagapur ॥koṅ॥
531~Sona kote singar akana,~Rūpa kote sajab akana nimin sundar choṭa~Nagapur rebu jonom akan ॥koṅ॥ ²
532~Nete Bareń banam do nete lekae banamea ॥koṅ॥~Diku talariachi diku lekae banamea ॥koṅ॥~Raja talariachi raja lekae banamea ॥koṅ॥
533~Sirma sai bonga non kiṅ , latar saibonga non king,~Jinatudo, lir-liḍaṅ g jinatu tiking rakab lena ॥koṅ॥~Doba simiṛi moyon akana mising,~Jen jen Ruture mising, tete jumang len ॥koṅ॥²
534~Sirma pukuri latar pukuri bonga leka nakukinga~Rakabe lena ॥koṅ॥~॥ jibiri mena rechalaṅ jiṅbiri koṭot́g king. Misinga.~Kūmbant́ mena rechalaṅ kumbat́ koṭoṅ g kinga.
535~Sirma soṛap, latar soṛap,~Joṛa sipaṛi king ṭaka sika lagit́ chaking, sepaṛi~Kana ॥koṅ॥²

536~Jugi racha Ṉuli daru. Soben koto baṛa mena,~Tara koto do metam, baṛage banoha ॥koṅ॥~Kae gamae kae pūkat́ redo Ṉuli mata dipilanga~Dili kulaeṅ ben ॥koṅ॥.~Kaben dili kulaeṅ redo. Kaben kaji kulaeṅ redo,~Sidage juṛim tiṛi renalom sabiaṅ ॥koṅ॥²
537~Manḍago biūren tana metam, manḍa manḍago biūrenatana,~Mit́ bita lai lagit́ manḍago biūren tan.. Ko ॥ ²
538~Namado Balań nengam menai, namado Balań na m menai,~Naṭiare buṛ baṛa lekam landa jagara ॥koṅ॥²~Naṅi do Balań nengaiṅ bangai, naiṅ do Balań naṅpui bangai,~Bakaṛire naṭal baṛa lekai gosojan ॥koṅ॥ ²
539~Nen naiki ṉoṛaḱ do; nen kisan ṉoṛaḱ do miti teko~Lunḍaya miti mondala ॥koṅ॥~Nen nai ko ṉoṛaḱ do nen kisan ṉoṛaḱ do sabonateko~Lunḍaya sabon jijilat́ ॥koṅ॥²
540~Nape ṉoṛaḱ do Balań rang teko dal tat́a sona~Tolakan ॥koṅ॥~Nale ṉoṛaḱ do Balań raka saiyūtedal akana racha~Jobora ॥koṅ॥
541~Siṭia redo biṭia redo, nalang gelaṅ juṛina menatema~Mitaṛiṅ ॥ ॥koṅ॥~Nara janam daru janam say say tem nelinga nora~Natomai ॥koṅ॥ ²

543~Latar soṛape, chetan soṛape, mayate Balań, seneme, doti~Ḍuliḍatan ॥koṅ॥~Dhotina ḍuliḍatan redo belati sabonete sapa~Rūṛayaben ॥koṅ॥

544~Kalakatta kore selaṭi narasi, chaibasa kore diriṅ naki,~Sira sirana soki boṛo nakin bena ॥koṅ॥ ²~Buddimaneto tan soki,~Kocha kocha skūlre buddim neto tana ॥koṅ॥~Bamasarea soben sunum; bakaṛi reaḱ malin baṛa;~Malin baṛa gosojan, namage goso jan ॥koṅ॥²
545~Saben baṛare rasido mena,~Chikate mate malin baṛa rasido banoḱa ॥koṅ॥~Rasido joro tan Balań,~Chikate mate nicha baṛa rasido jiro tana. ॥koṅ॥~Kili mili rami nonakochero merotan ॥koṅ॥²
546~Gaḍa redo binko mena, burū redo kulako mena,~Roi tare mamur beṭi, misa telaṅ ॥koṅ॥~Ṉamseno tan juṛi,~Bage natuiṅ tan juṛi chuila korem rūbaha juṛi kaji~Natuiṅ ben I koṅ ॥.
547~Nengai tikiṅ napui tikiṅ sorago rekiṅ āchi patale~Rekĩya ॥koṅ॥~Sorag reoaṅ kińa patal reoaṅ kia mat́ laṭa~Keo rikiṅ bakaṛa tana ॥koṅ॥
548~Munḍa kore bakaṛire, kisan kore bakaṛi re,~Golanchi baṛa Balań baṛa nakana ॥koṅ॥ ²~Jiṛim kusi janaredo,~Tiṛiṅ gating saben me dolaṅ senoā ॥koṅ॥
549~Siṅhabūm bakaṛi re, kolhan bagan bitarere.~Kili mili gulaṕ baṛa baṛ akana ॥koṅ॥~Saben baṛa puṭao lena; nepa terapa nelereo;~Chimin bugin chimin sundar soṛan nitiralen ॥koṅ॥²
550~Nape dope naiki tana, nape dope kisan tana,~Malin baṛale kape taral ² ॥koṅ॥~Nale dole renge tana,~Nale dole praja tana chanḍu mulado singilekam tarala~Tarala ॥koṅ॥

552~Sida dolaṅ juṛiken; pahile dolaṅ gati kena~Chirem kusor jan Balań, toṛam nirejan ॥koṅ॥~Namage nam namete, namage panja panjate,~Maraṅ burū sokoṛare seṭer lena ॥koṅ॥~Nipi nipi noyo lere noyako bakaṛay reó namage~Menetr ॥koṅ॥

555~Buru redo kulako mena Gaḍa redo biko mena he juṛi~Juṛi ² misatelanga ॥koṅ॥~He juṛi juṛi ² misatelanga ॥koṅ॥~Namado juṛi juṛi burū parom nai do juṛi gaṛa~Paromaen kagelaṅ jagara johar juṛingo ॥koṅ॥~Enaka gelaṅ jagara johar juḍingo.~Ṉoṛaḱren nega napuko, noṛaren baū dadako, nuju~Tanay menate toraṅ nora rekoā ॥koṅ॥~Nuju tanay menate toraṅ nora rekoārpra.

556~Tiṛim ripiṅ ripinga, kaṭam ṭemeṅ ṭemenga,~Namajuṛi tanachi, kaṭam chapui tan ॥koṅ॥~Ṉamjuṛi tanarchi tiṛim sabitana.~Tiṛim sarbi redo soki, kaṭam chapui redo soki,~Ṉamlo teṅ senot songeṅ senoā ॥koṅ॥~Ṉamloteṅ senoḱa songe senoāra.

557~Rabi krisi būṭ bage chanabare miḍem boyoṭi ॥koṅ॥~Bage chanabare miḍem boyo ṭi.~Latar ota bage saniṅ singi tur nasur mena mitaḍa~Gahaṭi ॥koṅ॥~Singi tur nasur mena meat́ gahaṭi.~Maya chabab.aṅ miḍem gahaṭi reaḱ numu gati jagarama~Tan ॥koṅ॥~Gahaṭi reaḱ numu garti jagaram tana..~Bulūṅ chanab aṅ bagem nitir akan mena garti baria~Buru kiṅ koṅ,..~Nitir akan mena gati baria burū kĩ.~Bos kandaru payate haṛiy akan gati udar bara~Nayate ॥koṅ॥~Haṛiy akan mena gati udar baranayate.~Nepa burū terapa burū maraṅ Gaḍa gongore bas akan~Mena gati bonga mandir ॥koṅ॥~Bas akan mena gati bonga mandira.~Sebaiṅ sanaṅ menai honaṅ guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaĩ~Sebaiya ॥koṅ॥~Guṛ gotom bano taiya chikaiṅ sebaiya॥
